commit_list.message:
Merge pull request #39 from inalyricalcoma/patch-1

+imageFilter: simple wrapper for GD function

Merge pull request #55 from ceramedia/master

Interlacing on/off for progressive loading

Merge pull request #50 from kkamkou/master

"headers sent" issue

Merge pull request #48 from kus/master

fill() function
Merge remote branch 'markhuot/master' into integrate
Added license to readme
Fixed issue with references not being properly passed to plugin functions.  Closes #4
Removing directory cleanout from docs task, it killed the .gitignore file (no good)
Removing files from apidocs folder, they shouldn't be there
More readme
Updating the readme
Moved src into its own directory, created apidocs directory for doc output, and started work on rake file
Added ability to work with image data streams.  Added new example as well.  This closes #2
Fixed JPEG support detection in PHP 5.3  closes #1
Putting the link back in place (just learning markdown... I suck :)
Converting readme to markdown

[DEPLOY] - Tagging new release

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/tags/3.0.063@64 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added support for remote images by circumventing some initial checks and instantiation time if "http://" is found in the filename.  This closes #8.

Also added some extra checks for "JPEG" support with GD, as "JPG" support isn't always used in certain versions of PHP (namely 5.3, where they changed "JPG" to "JPEG" in the support table).  More on this issue here: http://phpthumb.gxdlabs.com/forums/topic/gd-2034-compatibility-issue

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@63 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Switched out intval for ceil in size calculation functions.  Figure it's better to always round up then down / up depending.  This also fixes #5

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@53 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added new parameter to save function to allow new format.  This fixes #6

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@52 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added THUMBLIB_BASE_PATH constant to includes to allow for more robust inclusion of required files (previously had no paths in require statements)

This fixes #4

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@51 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

- Added a reflection example
 - Added proper return to reflection plugin for function chaining
 - Removed ThumbBase unit test as it's not usable with abstract classes

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@50 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

- Split PhpThumb object into its own file
 - Removed $newImage throughout, it was redundant and unused
 - Split save() and show() into individual functionality
 - ThumbBase is now an abstract class

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@49 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Fixed a small bug in rotate functions
Added new example, and added to another

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@48 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Created a few more examples

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@47 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Renamed example to be more inline with other examples

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@46 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Made all public manipulation functions return $this so functions could be chained properly

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@45 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

- Switched default implementation to be a defined constant for easier configuration
 - Added new examples
 - Fixed missing line in GD Reflection Plugin

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@44 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

- Updated doc blocks to include more copyright, author, license info
 - Created examples directory and started work within (lots of changes likely)
 - Added a few constants to the ThumbLib.inc.php file to help solve directory resolution issues

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@43 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

More work on unit tests
Added missing documentation in ThumbLib

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@33 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Updated tests, and added test.jpg file for them
Added missing docs to ThumbBase
Added unit test reports to svn:ignore

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@32 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added image rotation functionality to the GD Implementation of the class

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@30 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Created GD Reflection Lib Plugin

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@29 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added crop from center and regular ol' cropping functions

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@28 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

More work on GD implementation:
 - Created adaptive resize function (and supporting functions)
 - Added getters / setters for all member vars

Cleaned up ThumbLib / ThumbBase

Modified ThumbLib / ThumbBase to properly deal with plugins and load them on the class returned by the factory.

Created simple test plugin for the GD implmentation - adds debug functionality to the class.

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@27 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added alpha transparency preservation for PNG and GIF images in resize operation

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@26 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Ported a fair amount of functionality over from the original code, improving on it in various places
 - Added options array that can be passed
 - Added several default options to address various long-standing bugs
 - Moved some params to the options array

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@25 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Updated docs:
 - Changed copyright year
 - Added docblock headers to GdThumb file

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@23 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

- Started work on the GD Implementation of the class
- Fixed a few other convention issues

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@22 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Fixed up some formatting / convention issues for the sake of consistency

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@21 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added member verification unit tests
Added getters to private member vars on base class

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@12 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Added fix to pass $this to imported functions automatically

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@9 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

Finished documenting the core classes

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@8 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

* Updated the build.xml to contain a PhpDocumentor task
 * Added some beginning documentation to ThumbLib.inc.php to test the documentation task with

git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@3 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b

* Added initial phing build file
 * Created base directory structure
  * /apidocs - This will be where we store the PHPDocumentor-generated documentation
  * /code - The actual code base
  * /build - Where the library gets build and tarballed
  * /test - Where we'll put any unit tests we wish to run
  * /code/thumb_plugins - Default location for plugin classes
 * Started work on base class, !PhpThumb singleton, and !PhpThumbFactory class


git-svn-id: http://svn.gxdlabs.com/svn/phpthumb/trunk/code@2 cdefa903-eca5-4e94-866d-477f4c9c921b
Initial commit

repo_list.description: Simple Rails App in Need of Some Help
Parser / Tokenizer for DocBlocks in PHP Class Methods
Helps with serving font assets with Rails 3.1
IdentityCache is a blob level caching solution to plug into ActiveRecord. Don't #find, #fetch!
